remarks.format: ## Remarks 它們指使用者用來說明控制項的文字字串的類似屬性函式。The property functions similar to a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to. 請確定您擁有中的所有控制項的文字表示[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]，讓您可以以程式設計方式，以當地語系化的方式參考控制項。Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool IsOffscreenCore() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function IsOffscreenCore () As Boolean

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否與此相關聯超出螢幕以外。

summary.span: 這個方法是由 所呼叫。

returns.span: 如果這個項目不在畫面上，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不會指出項目是否可見。This property does not indicate whether the element is visible. 在某些情況下，項目會顯示在螢幕上，但仍看不到。In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible. 比方說，如果項目但遮蔽其他項目在螢幕上時，它可能無法顯示。For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible. 方法會傳回在此情況下`false`。In this case the method returns `false`.
